text: {| class="infobox" style="font-size: 88%; width: 22em; text-align: center" ! colspan=3 style="font-size: 125%; background-color: red; color: white; text- align:center;"| Active sport clubs of SD Lovćen |- ! width="33%" style="text-align:center;" |30px ! width="33%" style="text-align:center;" |30px ! width="33%" style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Football ! style="text-align:center;" |Football Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Handball |- ! style="text- align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text- align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Basketball ! style="text-align:center;" |Basketball Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Athletics |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Volleyball Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Volleyball ! style="text- align:center;" |Rugby |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text- align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text- align:center;" |Table tennis ! style="text-align:center;" |Car racing ! style="text-align:center;" |Kickboxing |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Powerlifting |} Lovćen Cetinje, commonly abbreviated as SD Lovćen, is a sports society organisation from Cetinje, Montenegro. By tradition, number of titles and historical results, it's one of most successful sports societies in Montenegro. Currently, there is 13 clubs in 10 different sports inside SD Lovćen organisation. ==Clubs== Currently, multiple clubs in Montenegro of different sports share the name Lovćen. Their management is separate and each operate independently from each other. Totally, there is 13 different clubs in 10 sports under the SD Lovćen organisation. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" ! Sport ! Club name ! Est |- | Football | Fudbalski klub Lovćen (Men) Ženski fudbalski klub Lovćen (Women) | 1913 2010 |- | Handball | Rukometni klub Lovćen (Men) | 1949 |- | Basketball | Košarkaški klub Lovćen (Men) Ženski košarkaški klub Lovćen (Women) | 1947 1947 |- | Volleyball | Odbojkaški klub Lovćen (Men) Ženski odbojkaški klub Lovćen (Women) | 1980 1980 |- | Athletics | Atletski klub Lovćen | 1945 |- | Table tennis | Stonoteniski klub Lovćen | 1952 |- | Rugby | Rugby Club Lovćen | 2013 |- | Car racing | Auto moto klub Lovćen | 1970 |- | Kickboxing | Kik-boks klub Lovćen | 2011 |- | Powerlifting | Powerlifting klub Lovćen | 2008 |- |} Sources: ==Honours and titles / team sports== Teams and sportists of SD Lovćen Cetinje won numerous titles of champions of Montenegro, Yugoslavia and on European individual tournaments. During the history, teams of SD Lovćen in team sports (football, handball, basketball, volleyball, rugby) won 19 national trophies. ===Lovćen Football Club=== *National Championship: ** Runner-up: 1 (2013–14) *National Cup: ** Winner: 1 (2013–14) ** Runner-up: 1 (2008–09) *National Order of the Montenegrin flag: **2013 ===Lovćen Handball Club=== *National Championship: ** Winner: 7 (1999-00, 2000-01, 2006-07, 2011-12, 2012-13, 2013-14, 2014-15) ** Runner-up: 9 (1996-97, 1998-99, 2001-02, 2002-03, 2007-08, 2008-09, 2010-11, 2015-16, 2016-17) *National Cup: ** Winner: 10 (2001-02, 2002-03, 2008-09, 2009-10, 2010-11, 2011-12, 2012-13, 2013-14, 2014-15, 2016-17) ** Runner-up: 2 (2006–07, 2015-16) *EHF Champions League: ** 5th place: (2000-01) ===Lovćen Basketball Club=== *National Championship: ** Runner-up: 2 (2006-07, 2008-09) *National Cup: ** Runner-up: 2 (2006-07, 2010-11) *Balkan League: ** Runner-up: 1 (2009-10) ===Lovćen Women Basketball Club=== *National Championship: ** Runner-up: 3 (2014-15, 2015-16, 2016-17) *National Cup: ** Runner-up: 3 (2014-15, 2015-16, 2016-17) ===Lovćen Rugby Club=== *National Sevens Championship: ** Winner: 1 (2014-15) *National Championship: ** Runner-up: 2 (2014-15) ==See also== *FK Lovćen *RK Lovćen *KK Lovćen *ŽFK Lovćen *ŽOK Lovćen Cetinje *Rugby Club Lovćen *Stadion Obilića Poljana *Cetinje ==References== Category:Lovćen Cetinje Category:FK Lovćen Cetinje Category:Multi-sport clubs in Montenegro
title: SD Lovćen Cetinje
